articles.title: Warriors’ Green hit with one-game ban for stepping on Kings’ Sabonis - The Guardian
articles.description: Golden State forward Draymond Green has been suspended for one game without pay for stepping on the chest of Sacramento’s Domantas Sabonis
articles.content: Golden State forward Draymond Green has been suspended for one game without pay for stepping on the chest of Sacramentos Domantas Sabonis and will miss Game 3 of the Warriors first-round playoff seri… [+2577 chars]

articles.author: F1
articles.title: Sainz maintains Australian GP penalty 'is too disproportionate' after Ferrari's appeal dismissed by FIA | Formula 1® - Formula 1
articles.description: After Ferrari's appeal over Carlos Sainz's late-race Australian Grand Prix penalty was dismissed on Tuesday, the Spanish driver took to social media to voice his disappointment – adding that he is "100% focused" on the next race in Azerbaijan.
